tool_description: The Best Crypto News API From Around The World!
name: Crypto News Live
title: Crypto News Live

api_list.name: Get individual source news
api_list.description: Get news about cryptocurrency from specific news resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-live7.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-live7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-live7.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-live7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all crypto currency news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about cryptocurrency around the world.
